findings.title: Numerous internal and external assumptions
findings.description: The system makes many assumptions about both the semantics of its internal code and the data provided to it from outside sources, relying on hard-coded values and expecting certain input.

findings.title: Token Scarcity
findings.description: Reviews of token scarcity issues must be executed manually to check for conditions such as supply ownership, total supply sufficiency, token distribution across exchanges, user understanding of risks associated with large funds or flash loans, and prevention of flash minting.
